rules.name: boy5To9Count
actions: data.put('boy5To9Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'male' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 5 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 9 'years'")))

rules.name: girl5To9Count
actions: data.put('girl5To9Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'female' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 5 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 9 'years'")))

rules.name: boy10To19Count
actions: data.put('boy10To19Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'male' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 10 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 19 'years'")))

rules.name: girl10To19Count
actions: data.put('girl10To19Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'female' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 10 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 19 'years'")))

rules.name: man20To50Count
actions: data.put('man20To50Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'male' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 20 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 50 'years'")))

rules.name: woman20To50Count
actions: data.put('woman20To50Count', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'female' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 20 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 50 'years'")))

rules.name: girlElcoCount
actions: data.put('girlElcoCount', size(service.filterResources(Patient, "Patient.gender = 'female' and Patient.maritalStatus.coding[0].code = 'M' and Patient.birthDate <= today() - 10 'years' and Patient.birthDate >= today() - 19 'years'")))

rules.name: ancRegIn2ndTrimester
actions: data.put('ancRegIn2ndTrimester', size(service.filterResources(Condition, "Condition.code.text = 'Pregnant' and (Condition.onset <= Condition.recordedDate - 107 'days') and (Condition.onsetDateTime >= Condition.recordedDate - 170 'days')")))

children.primaryText: জন্মের এক ঘণ্টার মধ্যে বুকের দুধ খাওয়া শিশুর সংখ্যা
ছয় মাস পর্যন্ত শুধুমাত্র বুকের দুধ খাওয়া শিশুর সংখ্যা
সাত মাসে বাড়তি খাবার খাওয়া শিশুর সংখ্যা
